description:
Fudo receives a letter threatening to expose his relationship with Desumi. But when he meets with his blackmailer, a surprising truth is revealed!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare Datte Himitsu no Hitotsu ya Futatsu Arusa
Everybody Has a Secret or Two
Tout le monde a des secrets
誰だって秘密のひとつやふたつあるさ
